grain-seal-unhook— if momentum surges: accelerate spark; choose traction.
Thrust Move Start F9B8— fast spark only; advance ignition; then push ignition • do one tiny move.
copper-groove-rebuild— execute ignition; launch launch; launch launch.
Rocket Rule Clamp F6A9— ship alive push; spot; stop • set one small limit.
cloud-lens-quiet— spark turns tiny; launch edge; exhale, once.
Run Gaze Drift D93A— ship one thrust; let push dim; keep momentum • softly look at one thing.
rituals.poetic_action_text:
grain-buffer-unhook— advance one momentum; let launch dim; keep engine.
Action: do this: touch fingertips together (return to the move) for 10s, then stop Also: touch fingertips together.

grain-seal-unhook— if momentum surges: accelerate spark; choose traction.
Action: select one tiny limit for the next 10 minutes (protect the thrust). Hold 2 breaths. stop Also: press your feet into the floor.

Thrust Move Start F9B8— fast spark only; advance ignition; then push ignition • do one tiny move.
Action: pace 15 slow steps, then stand still (hold the move) for 6s. pause Also: unclench your jaw once.

copper-groove-rebuild— execute ignition; launch launch; launch launch.
Action: do this: place a hand on your chest (return to the momentum) for 14s. pause Also: place a hand on your chest.

Rocket Rule Clamp F6A9— ship alive push; spot; stop • set one small limit.
Action: pick one tiny limit for the next 10 minutes (protect the move) for 13s, then pause Also: press your feet into the floor.

cloud-lens-quiet— spark turns tiny; launch edge; exhale, once.
Action: breathe out slowly; keep the move (3 breaths). Then stop Also: place a hand on your chest.

Run Gaze Drift D93A— ship one thrust; let push dim; keep momentum • softly look at one thing.
Action: gaze one object; note 3 details for 3 breaths. end (keep the momentum) Also: drop your shoulders once.
rituals.plain_text:
Touch fingertips together for 10s. Return to the move. Then stop Also: touch fingertips together.
Select one tiny limit for the next 10 minutes. Protect the thrust. Then stop Also: press your feet into the floor.
Pace 15 slow steps. Stand still for 6s. Hold the move. Then pause Also: unclench your jaw once.
Place a hand on your chest for 14s. Return to the momentum. Then pause Also: place a hand on your chest.
Pick one tiny limit for the next 10 minutes. Protect the move. Then pause Also: press your feet into the floor.
Breathe out slowly for 3 breaths. Keep the move. Then stop Also: place a hand on your chest.
Gaze at one object. Note 3 details. Then end Also: drop your shoulders once.

rituals.safety_notes: CRISIS: if you might act on self-harm thoughts, seek immediate human help (emergency / crisis line / trusted person).
